# Rich Parents (Trait)
## Overview
**Rich Parents**: You were born into a rich family, perhaps even the nobility, and even though you turned to a life of adventure, you enjoy a one-time benefit to your initial financesâ€”your starting wealth increases to 900 gp. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 61
